data.title: New Writing North launches new Publishing MA in collaboration with Northumbria University and Hachette UK
data.meta_description: We’re excited to announce the launch of a unique Publishing MA, which is now open for applications for September 2022....
data.text:
We’re excited to announce the launch of a unique Publishing MA, which is now open for applications for September 2022.

This new one-year Publishing MA programme at Northumbria University has been designed – and will be delivered – in collaboration with one of the world’s largest publishing houses, Hachette UK, and New Writing North.

Designed specifically to respond to recognised skills gaps within the contemporary publishing industry, the course will cover all stages of the publishing process, from commissioning and editing through to marketing, sales, data and production. Students will also benefit from a guaranteed placement with a global publisher and the opportunity to work with New Writing North on live writing development projects.

Read more on our Publishing MA page
